website_summaries.verdict: Teachers with limited art supply budgets will benefit from this classroom-size collection of markers.
pros: Contains 24 sets of 10 markers in assorted colors
Good for class projects or day care centers
Conical tip for fine line drawing
Can be used for artistic or writing assignments
cons: Pigment may not wash off skin or fabric easily
Some colors not as bright as expected

customer_reviews.title: Does not wash easily
customer_reviews.text: They draw nicely. Colors are vibrant. However, they do not wash out of clothes or off hands easily though they are labeled washable.
customer_reviews.author: dina t. engel

customer_reviews.title: 9 markers short!
customer_reviews.text: I love the presentation of this product, clean, crisp, very similar to other name-brand washable markers so they easily fit with the other containers I already have. BUT! It says 240 on the box, and I ordered in bulk to give sets out to families at my church and I was short almost an entire set except for green. The picture is of the remaining markers once I removed 20 full sets of markers, which should have had 4 of each color left. I really don't know what to do because this is literally false advertising and pricing. Amazon, please fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Using this product to create activity bags for a church. The markers seem to work great! I was a little worried about the brand because I love Crayola, but these were significantly cheaper. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 100%
customer_reviews.text: Super great quality and a steal of a price. They are exactly the colors they show not faded at all. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Mawma

customer_reviews.title: Madisi washable markers perfect for children of all ages
customer_reviews.text: I am using these markers in a classroom of children aged 3 - 9. The colors are lively, and being washable is a must for this age group. the caps are easy to handle also,
customer_reviews.author: N. Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I like how all the colors were separated into their own compartments. The markers were a new and fresh and had great color to them. These are good quality markers and perfect if you have a group of people that will be using them.
customer_reviews.author: Julidomo

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend to other teachers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for school use. Easy to clean. Good value comparing to Crayola.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I am a coordinator at a Day Program for individuals with physical and mental disabilities. One of their favorite activities is coloring and arts and crafts. These markers seem to meet the needs. We just received them so we haven't had a lot of time using them to see how they last. The only difference I can really see so far is some of the colors aren't as bright as the name brand. Overall I think they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Paulena Rymer

customer_reviews.title: Great value on jumbo pack markers.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for large group crafts where lots of markers are required. I can't imagine they will last a super long time but I have had them for several months and use them with large group crafts weekly and they haven't died yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bpischke

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price for a kid who loves to draw.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the markers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these markers for my center. I was a little worried about their quality. I had nothing to worry about, they are great! They are comparable to crayola! My students love the markers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional classroom crafts
customer_reviews.text: My students (high school) said these markers are great for class crafts. The box is nice enough for storing too.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mischke

customer_reviews.title: Value and consistency awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. My elementary school students use the all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Zane E. Cory Jr., J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for friend's kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchase that for my friend's kids. That's a fancy product. They all like it. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Vera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Elementary Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a few months ago to use in my classroom and they have really held up. I'm so glad to have found a comparable alternative to Crayola washable markers! My students use these everyday and I haven't had one dry out yet. Will definitely purchase again when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: K. Post

customer_reviews.title: Name brand last longer
customer_reviews.text: Will order name brand next time. These do not last as long as name brand
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: good but not very washable.
customer_reviews.text: good for the price BUT not really washable; little hard to wash from hands (and it’s an issue if you’re giving them to little ones). caps are easier for my toddler to put back by herself (comparing to crayola).
customer_reviews.author: Diogo Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for pre-k classroom, perfect for little hands and colors are vibrant. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons kindergarten class, the teacher loved them. Just as good as crayola
customer_reviews.author: Casey Conner

customer_reviews.title: Washable and the most fun ever.
customer_reviews.text: Another great product gifted to the kindergarten class..they have used these markers since the day they got them. They washout of clothes and are very durable. Thanks for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Burns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the "Color Me" shirts I make and they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My sunday school class is so grateful to have these
customer_reviews.author: Candace M Profit

customer_reviews.title: Good value for okay colors
customer_reviews.text: The markers work great for my classroom, however the yellow marker shows as a neon yellow rather than a true yellow. I had to order a set of regular yellow to supplement them.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy To Clean-Just as good if not better than Crayola
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a kids' camp and they easily cleaned off several floor types including vinyl, tile, and carpet. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: Really difficult to remove from hands and cloths. They are not washable as labeled!
customer_reviews.author: maqiang

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: We are not given money for supplies. I felt for 98 children (not at once) this was my best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer stewart

customer_reviews.title: Ok for bulk purchase, not the best markers out there
customer_reviews.text: Value is there, we needed markers in bulk and my kids run through them so quickly. Saturation of colors is decent, too. Trouble is, they’re not completely washable and leave a considerable stain on most surfaces. The only thing we’ve been able to get them off of is machine washable fabric. Everything else (walls, skin, you name it...) it’s staying.
customer_reviews.author: VentiKahuna

customer_reviews.title: Great color, but lids aren't that great
customer_reviews.text: These are good markers and ink it good. The only thing I don't like is the lids come off too easily. If you aren't careful you will find them dried out.
customer_reviews.author: average mom

product_meta.title: Madisi Washable Markers, Broad Line Markers, Assorted Colors, Classroom Bulk Pack, 240 Count
feature_bullets: 240 washable markers in 10 assorted colors, 24 markers in each color, classroom bulk pack
Including black, red, orange, pink, yellow, green, blue,violet, purple and brown.
Special CONICAL TIP allows you to draw fine lines with the point and broad strokes with the side.
Excellent for coloring, drawing and writing, perfect for teachers as classroom supplies.
Nontoxic, water based, bleed resistant, for children up 3 yrs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars146 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
